div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

I don't really know how my life will be in ten years. I'm just hoping that I'll enjoying what I'll do. I would like having a job that bring me happiness, having children and a husband who love me and that I love. If can say what will happen in ten years, I will be a great advocat who wins a lot of money and who could offer everything that my children want. All I know at the moment is the fact that I wanted the people around me be happy.
